nodes.text: The Crystal Cave, also known simply as the Naboo Cave, was a cave located on the Mid Rim world of Naboo. Nestled deep within the Gallo Mountains, the cave was home to a number of creatures known as the narglatch, many of which were sick. The cave was also filled with a number of crystals, some of which were imbued with the Force. Sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, Nos'lyn tasked a Force-sensitive with traveling to this cave, so that a crystal could be found to build a lightsaber.
The Crystal Cave was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
